doc:
Barbara Niven https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbara_Niven 0 Barbara Niven (born February 26, 1953) is an American actress and producer, best known for her performances in Lifetime movies and television roles in Pensacola: Wings of Gold, One Life to Live, and Cedar Cove. Niven also had the leading role in the independent film A Perfect Ending (2012). Barbara_Niven ( born February_26_,_1953 ) is an_American_actress_and_producer , best_known for her_performances in Lifetime_movies and television_roles in Pensacola : Wings of Gold , One_Life to_Live , and Cedar_Cove . Niven also had the_leading_role in the_independent_film A_Perfect_Ending_(_2012_) .
